text: The Canon de 340 mm Modèle 1887 was a heavy naval gun used as the main armament of several ships of the (French Navy) before World War I. It equipped the and the coast-defense ships and . == Ammunition == * APC (Armor-piercing, Capped) - * SAPC (Semi-Armor-piercing, Capped) - * CI (Cast iron) - ==Notes== ==References== * * Category:Naval guns of France Category:340 mm artillery
